00045 class AGFreeTime : public AGActivity {
00046 public:

00048         AGActivity(hh, das, prevTrips, 2),
00049         freqOut(das->freeTimeActivityRate),
00050         nbrDays(1) {};

00052         AGActivity(hh, das, prevTrips, 2),
00053         freqOut(das->freeTimeActivityRate),
00054         nbrDays(days) {};
